Articles.Content:
Hey guys and gals,

I previously had the H.O.M.E. plugin and thought it was great but I think it's been abandoned by its developers and heard a lot of people have problems with it, which is a shame really I think...

Anyway can anyone suggest any alternative plugins/mods that would be similar?

Thanks!

I tend to use Lack Luster Labs for building homes for my travelers, and I see by your sig that you already have that one. You may also look at Porkjet's inflatable hab pack and Sumghai's Fustek Station Parts expansion pack as well.

I am using H.O.M.E 2 and Hub/Hab modules with Bavarian tubes as my Habitation Mods. All work with 2.35

H.O.M.E 2 on Duna http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/0-18-1-h-o-m-e-start-kit/

Hab/Hub with Bavarian aerospace tubes on Laythe

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/43840-Hab-Hub-%28and-other-strange-things%29

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/52139-WIP-Bavarian-Aerospace-Tubes!-%28update11-13-13%29

Edited April 30, 2014 by Azazael

I tend to use Lack Luster Labs for building homes for my travelers, and I see by your sig that you already have that one. You may also look at Porkjet's inflatable hab pack and Sumghai's Fustek Station Parts expansion pack as well.

Downloaded!

I am using H.O.M.E 2 and Hub/Hab modules with Bavarian tubes as my Habitation Mods. All work with 2.35

H.O.M.E 2 on Duna

http://cloud-2.steampowered.com/ugc/846967607515776280/F05677966250329FD5792972E9675DF8CC8BF5B3/

Hab/Hub with Bavarian aerospace tubes on Laythe

http://cloud-2.steampowered.com/ugc/796319139702640309/DAFA6A30142C5167AAAEC33269EBBF677CF2CAAA/

I can't find the H.O.M.E 2 of the Hab/Hub mods in the spaceport or on the forums, don't think i'm looking in the right place!

Any chance you could throw up a link to them?
I downloaded H.O.M.E and H.O.M.E. 2 but the 3m horizontal legs won't open and neither will the legs on the living module?

Strange mine all works in 2.35 fine.I use HOME 3M legs

My home parts,flags,spaces folders are in the gamedata/BobCatind folder

Maybe it needs cleverbobcat.dll in the gamedata/cleverwalrus/plugins directory to work which comes with bobcats DEMV vehicles

Edited May 1, 2014 by Azazael

Strange mine all works in 2.35 fine.I use HOME 3M legs

My home parts,flags,spaces folders are in the gamedata/BobCatind folder

Maybe it needs cleverbobcat.dll in the gamedata/cleverwalrus/plugins directory to work which comes with bobcats DEMV vehicles

Cool thanks Azazael, I'll give that a try later on and see what happens.

EDIT: Could it have something to do with the fact that I'm still running V0.23?

Cool thanks Azazael, I'll give that a try later on and see what happens.

EDIT: Could it have something to do with the fact that I'm still running V0.23?

No mine has been working from pre 0.2 to 0.235 in all versions just fine

No mine has been working from pre 0.2 to 0.235 in all versions just fine

I deleted everything concerning those mods and re-installed them into the gamedata folder? starting to think maybe I need to download them again.

My directory structure looks like this:

C:\Program Files\Steam\steamapps\common\Kerbal Space Program\GameData\BobCatind\Parts\H.O.M.E

My directory structure looks like this:

C:\Program Files\Steam\steamapps\common\Kerbal Space Program\GameData\BobCatind\Parts\H.O.M.E

Yea I think mines pretty much the same! What did you do with the other one?

I use this mod before and 0.22 and it was fine! dunno whats changed to make i different?

OK I assume you are right clicking on HOME 2 living module (with its built in legs) and selecting lower

Try programming this via the action groups menu(In assembly bay) and set gear to toggle legs and see if you can lower legs without the right click menu

Edited May 1, 2014 by Azazael

OK I assume you are right clicking on HOME 2 living module (with its built in legs) and selecting lower

Try programming this via the action groups menu(In assembly bay) and set gear to toggle legs and see if you can lower legs without the right click menu

Tried that and it's working when I link it to the hotkeys, thanks!
Can anyone help with hab modules for space stations?

Can anyone help with hab modules for space stations?

Look into FusTek!

what version ? mine is 0.90

and where download it ?

thank you

All works with 0.9 Here is my Home 2 and DEMV`s on Laythe at night. Still cant get the Home docking tubes to dock together.

Edited January 16, 2015 by Azazael
